M. D. Abramoﬀ
M. Niemeijer
M. A. Viergever
B. Van Ginneken
dcterms:description: The DRIVE (Digital Retinal Images for Vessel Extraction) dataset contains 40 color images which includes 20 training and 20 test images having a plane resolution of 565 × 584. Each retinal image is an 8-bit color image. For the test set, two subsets of manually segmented ground truth images (from two different observers) are provided.
dcterms:title: DRIVE
